		Question: what currency should take to mexico
		Answer:
answer: The best currency to take to Mexico is the US dollar. The US dollar is widely accepted in Mexico, and you will get a better exchange rate for your money than if you exchange it for Mexican pesos. You can also use credit cards and debit cards in most places in Mexico, but it is always a good idea to have some cash on hand for small purchases.
